name: Unbound Crusaders of the Crow
description: Hailing from Widowâ€™s Peak, the Unbound Crusaders of the Crow are known as handlers, friends of candescent crows, and have since developed a sixth sense to detect nearby magic use. Now finally free from the prison cells of the Gibbun, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
